description:
A further refinement of the Direto XR, Elite’s latest direct drive trainer delivers a smoother and quieter ride that ever before. Updated with a heavier flywheel, flex feet that let you enjoy the natural sway of a ride, and Bluetooth hub functionality, the Justo is worthy of sitting at the top of Elite’s trainer line. Controllable via apps and software the Justo reproduces the actual challenge of the course you're riding. With a maximum incline of 24%, you can test yourself against the hardest sections of Alto de L'Angliru from the comfort of home. If you're a green jersey type, there are up to 2300W of resistance (at 40km/h), so you get the most from your out the saddle sprints. If you're going to put the effort in to follow a power-based training program, power accuracy of 1% puts you on par with the top-tier standalone power meters. When you don’t feel like riding in an app, or maybe you’re caught in a power outage, there are even 2 stand alone modes that let you set the resistance through My E-Training app on your phone.

  • Direct drive trainer ensures that every watt you generate is accounted for – and no more worn trainer tires
  • Quiter than ever, essentially all you hear is your drivetrain
  • Flex feet provide dynamic riding experience, 2 types of feet included: red are softer for more movement, black are firmer for a more stable ride
  • Optical Torque Sensor (OTS) provides precise power measurement within +/- 1%. Integrated power meter delivers the data accuracy
  • Maximum brake power of 2300W at 40km/h
  • Heavier 6.2kg (13.67lb) flywheel provides an incredibly smooth outdoor-like feel
  • “The best trainer Elite has ever made.” DC Rainmaker
  • Compatible cassettes: Shimano and SRAM 9/10/11 speed, Campagnolo 9/10/11/12 speed (code 1014233), SRAM NX 12 speed and Shimano micro spline 12 speed (code 1014315). These cassettes are sold separately
  • Freehub body is required and available separately for Campagnolo, SRAM XD and XD-R and Shimano 12-speed micro Spline
  • ERG mode maintains a certain effort level regardless of your cadence
  • Easy start ERG mode, so no more suffering when you stop pedaling during a session
  • Compatible with Elite’s Rizer incline simulator for a realistic grade ranging from 20% to -10%
  • Dynamic automatic calibration keeps your readings precise and race data accurate
  • Wide, stable base can be folded for transport and storage. Legs automatically lock in place when unfolded
  • Suitable for 130 to 135mm hubs with 5mm diameter quick release axles and up to 142x12mm thru axle hubs
  • Adapters available separately for axles: 148x12mm (Boost), 135x10mm and 135x12mm
  • Realistic slope simulation of up to 24%
  • 3 LED lights provides feedback on what is connected
  • ANT+™, FE-C, and Bluetooth smart control takes care of resistance adjustments
  • Speed, cadence and power can broadcast via ANT+ and Bluetooth smart to your bike computer or phone
  • Able rebroadcast Bluetooth signals, letting your smart TV or computer see your metrics come in as one signal from the trainer, great for devices that only support 2 Bluetooth signals, e.g., AppleTV, as there is now a free signal for extra accessories
  • Elite My E-training app lets you choose courses, breaks down your pedal stroke and more
  • Includes 12 month subscription to Elite’s e-Training app and is compatible with interactive apps like Zwift (30-day trial included), Trainer Road, Kinomap, Rouvy,FulGaz and more
  • Wired internet connectivity gives those with dodgy Wi-Fi, options. (Not included Elite dongle required for wired internet connection.)
  • 2 stand alone modes let you use the trainer with the My E-Training app, no internet needed in one mode, no anything needed for the other mode
  • Can use 120-240V power outlet for optimal compatibility when travelling
  • Includes: front wheel block, axle spacers, black flex feet, power adapter and documentation
  • All plastic components are at least 46% recycled
  • Folded dimensions: 57 x 19.5 x 52cm
  • Footprint: 72 x 57cm
name: Elite Justo Interactive Trainer
